actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the confidentiality of medical and/or dental records of patients not receiving assistance from the Federal Government.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Prohibits government officials from examining the medical or dental records of persons who are not receiving medical care paid for in whole or in part by the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the confidentiality of medical and/or dental records of patients not receiving assistance from the Federal Government.
